keywords.value: La Nueva Televisora del Sur CA (Telesur)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Argentina’s president, Mauricio Macri, will cut its funding of a regional television network started by the Venezuelan government in 2005.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Argentina: President Won’t Fund Leftist TV Network
headline.main: Argentina: President Won’t Fund Leftist TV Network

snippet: Argentina’s president, Mauricio Macri, will cut its funding of a regional television network started by the Venezuelan government in 2005.
abstract: Pro-business administration of Argentina's Pres Mauricio Macri plans to cut funding to Telesur, regional television network started by Venezuelan government in 2005, citing lack of 'pluralism' and being shut out of financial decisions.
